title: A continuation of the secret history of White-hall from the abdication of the late K. James in 1688 to the year 1696 writ at the request of a noble lord ... : the whole consisting of secret memoirs ... : published from the original papers : together with The tragical history of the Stuarts ... / by D. Jones ...
author: Jones, D. (David), fl. 1676-1720.
publisher: Printed, and are to be sold, by R. Baldwin ...,
